title: "Facebook Says Its New AI Can Identify More Problems Faster"
excerpt: "Shot Learner” system doesn’t need to see as many examples to identify troublesome posts, and it works in more than 100 languages. Meta Platforms, Facebook’s owner, now says it has deployed a new artificial intelligence moderation system for some tasks that can be adapted to new enforcement jobs more quickly than its predecessors because it requires much less training data."
